item.title: [Rel]Lightsabers 317 With Itemdef Ints!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

here is the itemDef for those who want it

case 9088: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.name = "Blue LightSabre"; itemDef.description = "A blue lightsaber."; itemDef.modelID = 50570;//Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 1350; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 424; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.maleEquip2 = 3; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 50571;//Male Wield View itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 50571;//Female Wield View break; case 9087: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.name = "Red LightSabre"; itemDef.description = "A red lightsaber."; itemDef.modelID = 50568;//Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 1350; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 424; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.maleEquip2 = 3; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 50569;//Male Wield View itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 50569;//Female Wield View break; case 9086: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.name = "Yellow LightSabre"; itemDef.description = "A yellow lightsaber."; itemDef.modelID = 50566;//Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 1350; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 424; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.maleEquip2 = 3; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 50565;//Male Wield View itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 50565;//Female Wield View break; item.title: [Rel]Lightsabers 317 With Itemdef Ints!
item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

These are the lightsabers i modeled myself my first post/model please rate 1-10 and give me feed back hope you like them Colors. Red, Green, Purple, White, Blue, and Yellow
Also gzipped
[size=24pt]Comment if you like or dislike it! or REMOVED and credits to me please[/size]

Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?26j2h5r3x3wjkf1
Direct Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/57788562/Lightsabers.rar

Thank you loveandpower for Itemdef Ints
